4300430.name: Assassin Of Spider
4300430.description:
STORY:

Start journey in this medieval third person rpg game and be the hero and beat evil spider boss

Giant spider and his army has captured valuable skulls and hidden them. Player warrior mission is to beat spider boss and his difficult army in this medieval rpg game. Player fight against different small creatures which have different attacks like punch attack, magic attack, bomb attack etc and also small spider are in different themed medieval levels. End of level player meet big spider who has different attacks. Player need kill boss and then fence or gate will disappear and player can collect skull and finish level. Game contain now 7 different levels. Player can use health potions and select several different swords and axe to use.

FEATURES:

  • 7 levels
    - RPG Game and player character has big different sword and axe weapons
    - different small creature enemies with punch attacks, magic attacks and small spider enemies
    - Use healing potions to increase health
    - Giant spider boss end of every level. Beat giant spider boss and unlock magic gate to collect skull and finish level
4300430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
